name: Orator
description: Only the fool sees war as a means to an end; you know the integrity of humanity is far more penetrable than any chassisâ€™s exterior hull plating. So let fools be fools, and speak your truth. Tell them the gods they worship die a quiet death; tell them the manna they covet invites despondency; and the voices they follow lead nowhere. They will hear you, this is undeniable, and in doing so will even begin to question the motives of the hands they use to hold and the feet they use to walk. Your power is that of the Orator, and in years to come your histories will paint war a bygone remembrance.

ranks.name: Convincing Rhetoric
ranks.description:
TriggerYou or an ally uses the lock on or scan action against a hostile character.

You open a secluded comms channel with the targeted character. The target becomes impaired until it succeeds at a contested systems check at the end of their turn to end this effect. The impaired condition cannot be cleared any other way. Using this talent again on a new character ends this effect early.

ranks.name: Voice of Reason
ranks.description:
You start combat with 1 Orator die - a d6- representing your power of speech. At the end of your turn when you do not attack or force any saves from hostile characters, you gain 1 Orator die up to a maximum of 3 Orator Die. They last until expended or the current scene ends.

1/round as a free action you can expend Orator Dice for one of the following effects:

Investigate (1 die) - Choose a hostile character in line of sight. The next attack made against that character is rolled twice, taking the highest result as final.

Object (1 die)- Choose a hostile character in line of sight. The next attack from that character is rolled twice, choosing the lowest result.

Cast Doubt - (2 dice) Choose a hostile character in line of sight. That character cannot benefit from or be targeted by their allies' systems or traits until the end of their next turn.

ranks.name: The March of the Ten Thousand
ranks.description:
Start combat with 1 additional Orator die
Gain an additional option for your orator die:

Demoralize - (3 dice) Choose a hostile character in line of sight. That character cannot attack until the end of its next turn. An affected character then becomes immune to this effect until the end of combat.
